Text.Page: You delivered carving material to Dolme and received a Horn Helm.

, welcome to the beach party.

If you're interested in procuring a horn helm, you might be out of luck. Lots of customers looking to buy horn helms this year, and I bring near enough horns with me.

I tell you what, though, : You go get me two arachnen horns from Serpentis Isle, and I'll make you a horn helm. Deal?

Well done, ! These are some fine horns, and they should last me through the rest of the day.

Here's your horn helm, and thank you.
I know getting arachnen horns isn't easy, <PCNAME>. But I'd very much appreciate it if you could hurry.
